title: Wrong Item Delivered
complaint_description: Customer received a different item than ordered. Expected Ergo Office Chair, but received Bestseller Fiction Novel.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
Apologize, request a photo of the delivered item, offer prepaid return label, and arrange a replacement shipment of Ergo Office Chair with expedited shipping at no charge.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #1686. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
